import React from "react"; const FilterForm = ({ filters, setFilters }) => { return (

Filter Items

setFilters({ ...filters, category: e.target.value })} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2" />
setFilters({ ...filters, minPrice: e.target.value })} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2" /> setFilters({ ...filters, maxPrice: e.target.value })} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2" />
{/* Other filter inputs for size, color, designer, rating */}
setFilters({ ...filters, size: e.target.value })} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2" />
setFilters({ ...filters, color: e.target.value })} className="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm p-2" />
); }; export default FilterForm;
